mapper.sql: id, evaluatTplId, title, type, cntImg, score, solution, sort, createDate
mapper.update: update evaluat_case set evaluatTplId = #{evaluatTplId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cntImg = #{cntImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, solution = #{solution,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createDate = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
